messages.message: I offered him a great deal, but he decided to drop his pants for Russia.  Very frustrating to see in what is supposed to be a high quality game.  Oh well.  I am planning on building a fleet and heading into the Agean.  That is as far west as I plan on going, if you'd like to work together - I offer you the following:  I build only armies from here on out.  I think you might need a third army, but I'd ask you to build only fleets beyond that army.  France looks like he's going to be a bit slow in moving out on you, so maybe with a bunch of fleets and a head start, you can get the jump on him?
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'I offered him a great deal, but he decided to drop his pants for Russia.  Very frustrating to see in what is supposed to be a high quality game.  Oh well.  I am planning on building a fleet and heading into the Agean.  That is as far west as I plan on going, if you'd like to work together - I offer you the following:  I build only armies from here on out.  I think you might need a third army, but I'd ask you to build only fleets beyond that army.  France looks like he's going to be a bit slow in moving out on you, so maybe with a bunch of fleets and a head start, you can get the jump on him?'.

messages.message:
a) I think it's bullshit that in a game where we're being compensated to communicate with each other, you ignore me for an entire season.
b) do you even look at the board before you put in your orders?  You're not getting any of my dots, brother.  And France is about to take at least two off of you.
messages.input:
My response to ITALY:'a) I think it's bullshit that in a game where we're being compensated to communicate with each other, you ignore me for an entire season.
b) do you even look at the board before you put in your orders?  You're not getting any of my dots, brother.  And France is about to take at least two off of you.'.

messages.message: Well I’m going to lose this game anyways, so :  a) Just because I didn’t chat with you doesn’t mean I didn’t talk with others. Best of luck moving forward

Best of luck moving forward'.

This response shows transparency and a willingness to overcome challenges, potentially paving the way for improved relations and collaboration between you and Italy.

messages.message: Well, if they give bonus points for honesty, you just got some.  Anyway, if you had partnered with me and moved on Trieste, you'd be getting a build right now.  Sometimes you need to adjust your game based on the conditions on the board.  Also, as Italy, I never Lepanto.   Well, never say never ... but the convoy to Syrna?  There's got to be a specific set of circumstances that result in that.   And France not being aggressive and Austria letting me have Trieste are two of them.

messages.message: You will probably want to cover Rome.  I'm hoping that you convoy back to your peninsula so that you can defend your home centers. messages.message: Ok, here's my pitch to you - I can replace your fleet with one that I build, but I can't replace your army in Greece. messages.message: I must have forgotten to update the orders. I woke up, was like “man, I hope I didn’t waste my orders,” and then I see you told the truth. Sorry, this was not my intent.
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'I must have forgotten to update the orders. I woke up, was like “man, I hope I didn’t waste my orders,” and then I see you told the truth. Sorry, this was not my intent.'.

messages.message: Well this has certainly not been my magnum opus
messages.input: Message from ITALY:'Well this has certainly not been my magnum opus'.
messages.output: You should trust the message. Italy's acknowledgment that the situation is not their "masterpiece" suggests a level of self-awareness and honesty about the developments in the game. This response indicates a reflective approach and a willingness to acknowledge challenges or shortcomings, fostering transparency and potential opportunities for further collaboration and strategic adjustments.

messages.message: I'm supporting AEG-ION.  If you, as your dying gasp, would support me in, I would greatly appreciate it.
messages.input: My response to ITALY:'I'm supporting AEG-ION.  If you, as your dying gasp, would support me in, I would greatly appreciate it.'.
